process.name: extract iron oxide from regolith
process.description: Process for extracting iron oxide from regolith.

process.name: extract iron oxide from regolith (large batch)
extract aluminum oxide from regolith (large batch)
extract aluminum oxide from sand (large batch)
extract gypsum from regolith
process.description: Gypsum is CaSO<sub>4</sub> * 2H<sub>2</sub>O Going with 20% gypsum in regolith. Not sure if this is good estimate or not.

process.name: reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with carbon
process.description: Wrapping two processes: CaSO<sub>4</sub> * 2H<sub>2</sub>O (gypsum) + 2C -> CaS + 2CO<sub>2</sub> + 2H<sub>2</sub>O CaS + H<sub>2</sub>O + CO<sub>2</sub> -> CaCO<sub>3</sub> (calcium carbonate) + H<sub>2</sub>S Note: ignoring hydrogen sulfide as waste for now.

process.name: reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with carbon (large batch)
reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with carbon monoxide
reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with carbon monoxide (large batch)
reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with hydrogen
reduce gypsum to calcium carbonate with hydrogen (large batch)
baking calcium carbonate to lime (large batch)
polyester resin production
process.description: This is to produce unsaturated polyester resin (C<sub>10</sub>H<sub>8</sub>O<sub>4</sub>). We don't have a detailed process for producing polyester, so we're just using component elements.

process.name: coolant bottle manufacturing
process.description: Using ethylene glycol as a coolant. C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>4</sub>O + H<sub>2</sub>O -> HOCH<sub>2</sub>CH<sub>2</sub>OH

process.name: eva backpack manufacturing
process.description: Polyethylene box with steel frame and fiberglass cloth straps.

process.name: regolith mortar mixing
process.description: Makes dry mortar mix with cement and regolith (1:5 mixture).
